amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new paragraph within section 2 excluding oil and gas leasing in any tract located in the Washington/Oregon planning area.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to add a new paragraph within section 2 excluding oil and gas leasing in any tract located in the Washington/Oregon planning area.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DelBene amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 219 (Roll no. 50).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A023) offered by Ms. DelBene.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the DelBene amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 219 (Roll no. 50).
